xmodel.name: Investment Goods Market
xmodel.author: Simon Gemkow, Philipp Harting, Sander van der Hoog

variable.name: igfirm_fin_man_debug
variable.description: debug flag

variable.name: switch_igfirm_endogenous_innovation_probability
variable.description: Switch for enogeneous r and probability: if 1 then the probability of success depends on the mean revenues

variable.name: igfirm_exogenous_innovation_probability
variable.description: Switch for enogeneous r and probability: if 1 then the probability of success depends on the mean revenues

variable.name: power_of_end_probability_function
variable.description: Power of the function determining the endogenous probability of a successful innovation.

variable.name: igfirm_producer_debug
variable.description: debug flag

variable.name: igfirm_exogenous_productivity_progress
variable.description: Gives the increase of productivity of an innovation if igfirm is switch off.

variable.name: symmetric_shock
variable.description: Binary parameter to set if the energy shock is symmetric.

variable.name: energy_shock_start
variable.description: Day when the energy shock starts.

variable.name: energy_shock_end
variable.description: Day when the energy shock ends.

variable.name: const_energy_shock_intensity
variable.description: Mark up on the capital goods price that flows out of the system, representing energy costs.

variable.name: energy_shock_frequency
variable.description: The frequency at which the energy price is updated.

variable.name: innovation_by_random
variable.description: Timing of an innovation can be randomly or predetermined.

variable.name: ig_good_limited_offer
variable.description: Binary variable: If eq 1 then the IG firm offers a limited range of goods other wise it offers all goods it has ever developed

variable.name: max_offer_ig_good
variable.description: Maximum number of IG goods offered if ig_good_limited_offer equals 1

variable.name: initial_frontier_firm_transition_phase
variable.description: The initial value of firm's memory variable technology_frontier.

variable.name: initial_productivity_firm
variable.description: This variable can be used to set the initial productivity of firm's capital stock and change it by setting up an experiment with the ExpGUI.

variable.name: initial_specific_skills
variable.description: This variable can be used for setting the specific skills.

variable.name: strenght_of_tech_progress
variable.description: This sets the strenght of tech. progress if it is predetermined. 1 is low, 2 is medium, and 3 is high.

variable.name: linear_combination_pricing_ig_good
variable.description: This sets the weights of the linear combination for the ig price setting.

variable.name: initial_capital_price_wage_ratio
variable.description: This variable can be used for setting the ratio between the capital price and the wage offer.

dataType.name: capital_good_request
dataType.description: Holds the capital good orders of the firms

dataType.name: vintage
dataType.description: Holds information about the different vintages.

dataType.name: adt_sales_per_vintage
dataType.description: Holds information about the sales of each vintage.

variable.name: productivity
variable.description: Current productivity of the offered capital good

variable.name: capital_good_price
variable.description: Current price of the offered capital good

variable.name: vintages
variable.description: The offered technology vintages

variable.name: sales_per_vintage
variable.description: Sales per vintage

variable.name: mean_productivity_of_sales
variable.description: Averaged productivity of sold capital goods within the last production period.

variable.name: ratio_sold_productivity_best_practice
variable.description: Ratio of the Averaged productivity of sold capital goods and the best practice technology.

variable.name: igfirm_endogenous_innovation_probability
variable.description: 10. Probability that the investment goods producer innovate a new technology if igfirm is switchoff.

variable.name: revenue_per_day
variable.description: Revenue of the current day

variable.name: net_profit
variable.description: Earnings minus tax payment

variable.name: current_shares_outstanding
variable.description: Number of shares outstanding

variable.name: energy_price_markup
variable.description: Mark up on capital goods price.

variable.name: energy_costs_per_day
variable.description: The share of the daily capital bill that are energy costs.

variable.name: earnings_per_day
variable.description: The collected revenues minus energy costs.

variable.name: cum_energy_costs
variable.description: This is to compute the total expenses for energy.

variable.name: last_net_profits
variable.description: Array of the planned production quantities in the past

variable.name: mean_sales_last_months
variable.description: Mean of sales over the last months.

variable.name: last_sales
variable.description: Array of the last sales in the past

variable.name: dividend_payment
variable.description: Dividend payment of the IGFirm.

variable.name: duration_until_next_innovation
variable.description: Period counter after the last innovation.

variable.name: unit_costs
variable.description: Costs per unit of output.

variable.name: sales
variable.description: Number of units sold.

variable.name: capital_good_demand
variable.description: Capital good demand

variable.name: capital_good_demand_last_month
variable.description: Capital good demand of the previous month

variable.name: sales_last_month
variable.description: Number of units sold in the last n periods.

variable.name: cum_revenue
variable.description: Revenue in the actual period.

variable.name: cum_revenue_last_month
variable.description: Revenue in the actual period.

variable.name: innovation_sheme_low_progress
variable.description: This is the innovation sheme if low technological progress is selected

variable.name: innovation_sheme_medium_progress
variable.description: This is the innovation sheme if medium technological progress is selected

variable.name: innovation_sheme_high_progress
variable.description: This is the innovation sheme if high technological progress is selected

variable.name: mean_general_skills
variable.description: Average value of general skills

variable.name: mean_adaptation_speed
variable.description: Average adaptation speed in the economy

variable.name: productivity_progress_in_economy
variable.description: Economy wide productivity progress. Used to compute cost incrreases.

variable.name: economy_wide_capital_stock
variable.description: Economy wide productivity progress. Used to compute cost incrreases.

function.name: IGFirm_initialize_variables
function.description: IGFirm resets some variables at the beginning of the production cycle.

function.name: IGFirm_innovation_process
function.description: IGFirm updates productivity if there was an innovation.

function.name: IGFirm_set_price_send_info
function.description: IGFirm sets the prices and sends the information on prices and productivities of their capital goods.

function.name: IGFirm_receive_order_delivers_capital_goods
function.description: IGFirm receives order messages from firms and sends the capital goods.

function.name: IGFirm_calc_revenue
function.description: IGFirm calculates the revenue and profits.

message.name: productivity
message.description: IGFirm sends price and productivity of caputal goods.

message.name: capital_good_request
message.description: Firms send the capital good orders.

message.name: capital_good_delivery
message.description: IGFirm sends the capital goods to the firms.
